data.name: AccidentLogs
data.comment: A record of settlement incidents which resulted in some degree of physical injury.

data.name: AirQualityReports
data.comment: Chemical analyses of atmospheric recycling systems in surface settlements.

data.name: Amm_Grenade_EMP
data.comment: A deployable device that temporarily disrupts shields with an electromagnetic pulse.

data.name: Amm_Grenade_Frag
data.comment: An explosive weapon that damages nearby targets upon detonation.

data.name: Amm_Grenade_Shield
data.comment: A deployable device that generates a barrier designed to absorb incoming attacks.

data.name: AtmosphericData
data.comment: Scientific observations and measurements of a planet's atmosphere.

data.name: BiochemicalAgent
data.comment: A compound designed to break down organic tissue.

data.name: BlacklistData
data.comment: Sensitive information regarding individuals and/or groups deemed untrustworthy or dangerous.

data.name: BloodTestResults
data.comment: Blood test data related to settlement health checks and policy adherence.

data.name: BuildingSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the architectural design of a building.

data.name: Bypass
data.comment: A single-use device used to circumvent security systems.

data.name: CampaignPlans
data.comment: Information, schedules and objectives for a large-scale public initiative.

data.name: CensusData
data.comment: Detailed information and statistics on the size and composition of a population.

data.name: ChemicalExperimentData
data.comment: Proposals and research results related to various chemical experiments.

data.name: ChemicalFormulae
data.comment: Data related to the classification and research applications of newly developed chemicals.

data.name: ChemicalInventory
data.comment: A detailed log of active and inert chemical materials stored within a facility.

data.name: ChemicalPatents
data.comment: A list of registered patent applications for chemical inventions.

data.name: CombatantPerformance
data.comment: Observational data on a subject's proficiency in ground-based combat operations.

data.name: CombatTrainingMaterial
data.comment: Training plans and exercises designed to improve overall battlefield effectiveness.

data.name: CompactLibrary
data.comment: A large selection of literary classics and reference works in digital form.

data.name: DegradedPowerRegulator
data.comment: A non-functional fuel regulator used in power plants.

data.name: DutyRota
data.comment: Details of the activities and schedules of all personnel at a settlement.

data.name: EmployeeDirectory
data.comment: A complete list of staff members with their relevant personal details.

data.name: EmployeeGeneticData
data.comment: Unique genetic data records for a settlement's past and current personnel.

data.name: EnergyCell
data.comment: A single-use item that restores energy to suit batteries.

data.name: EvacuationProtocols
data.comment: Detailed instructions for the abandonment of a settlement by all registered personnel.

data.name: ExplorationJournals
data.comment: Collected first-hand accounts of the author’s experiences and discoveries in deep space.

data.name: FactionAssociates
data.comment: Information on a faction's political allies and related beneficial relationships.

data.name: FactionDonatorList
data.comment: A record of individuals or organsiations that have made financial contributions to a faction.

data.name: FactionNews
data.comment: Publicly available press releases and ongoing news stories related to a faction.

data.name: FinancialProjections
data.comment: Forecasts of a company's future income, expenditure and profit margins.

data.name: HealthPack
data.comment: A portable medical kit used to treat wounds.

data.name: Hush
data.comment: A recreational drug that induces a state of extreme relaxation while limiting auditory input.

data.name: Infinity
data.comment: A brand of exotic cologne that chemically adapts to please the olfactory system.

data.name: Insight
data.comment: A wearable device designed to provide the user with real-time information about their immediate environment.

data.name: InternalCorrespondence
data.comment: A record of communications by members within an organisation's network.

data.name: LargeCapacityPowerRegulator
data.comment: A complex device designed to regulate the energy generated by a settlement's power reactor.

data.name: Lazarus
data.comment: A recreational drug that places the user in state of euphoric oblivion, sometimes for as long as four days.

data.name: LiteraryFiction
data.comment: Text-based fictional entertainment in a range of genres and styles.

data.name: MaintenanceLogs
data.comment: Records of routine tasks to maintain settlement equipment or infrastructure.

data.name: MeetingMinutes
data.comment: A record of discussion topics and action points from a meeting of settlement personnel.

data.name: MineralSurvey
data.comment: Results from a study of mineral deposits hidden beneath the surface of a planet.

data.name: MultimediaEntertainment
data.comment: A range of popular entertainment products available in multiple formats.

data.name: NetworkAccessHistory
data.comment: Access records detailing individual user activity on specific networks.

data.name: NextOfKinRecords
data.comment: Details of an individual's closest living relatives, partners and designated contacts.

data.name: OperationalManual
data.comment: Instructive texts for the use and maintenance of a mechanism, system or vehicle.

data.name: PatrolRoutes
data.comment: Deployment schedules and paths used in routine security operations.

data.name: PayrollInformation
data.comment: Staff members' past and present salary payments and financial transfer methods.

data.name: PersonalLogs
data.comment: Private text or audio/visual recordings made by an individual.

data.name: PharmaceuticalPatents
data.comment: A list of registered patent applications each relating to a specific drug.

data.name: ProductionReports
data.comment: Work logs that collate information on cost, output and requirements.

data.name: ProductionSchedule
data.comment: A detailed timetable outlining machine allocations, worker requirements and associated deadlines.

data.name: PurchaseRecords
data.comment: A list of purchased items and materials including total costs and supplier details.

data.name: PurchaseRequests
data.comment: Requisition orders for specific items or materials submitted for authorisation.

data.name: Push
data.comment: A recreational drug that temporarily increases cognitive function.

data.name: RadioactivityData
data.comment: Measurements of the output from natural or artificial sources of radiation.

data.name: ReactorOutputReview
data.comment: Analysis and measurement of energy production from a settlement's power centre.

data.name: ResidentialDirectory
data.comment: Current occupants and registered contact information for a specific residential area.

data.name: SalesRecords
data.comment: Information of a settlement's gross and profit, stock exports and outstanding invoices.

data.name: SettlementDefencePlans
data.comment: Defensive tactics intended to protect a specific settlement from a hostile force.

data.name: ShareholderInformation
data.comment: A list of individuals and groups who have a financial stake in a settlement or organisation.

data.name: SurveilleanceLogs
data.comment: Audiovisual data gathered using technological monitoring and/or tracking techniques.

data.name: SyntheticPathogen
data.comment: A synthesised virus created by splicing together several different diseases.

data.name: TaxRecords
data.comment: Details of an organisation's tax payments and related documentation.

data.name: TopographicalSurveys
data.comment: Measurements and analysis of a specific area of a planetary body's surface.

data.name: TravelPermits
data.comment: A registry of all travel permits assigned to the personnel of a company or facility.

data.name: TroopDeploymentRecords
data.comment: Details of personnel and equipment used during a military or security operation.

data.name: UnionMembership
data.comment: Personnel who have signed up to a trade or labour union or political lobby

data.name: UniversalTranslator
data.comment: A wearable device capable of instantaneously translating any of the most common human languages.

data.name: VaccinationRecords
data.comment: A list of vaccinations issued to each member of a settlement's personnel.

data.name: VaccineResearch
data.comment: Results of clinical experiments and efficacy tests of a particular vaccine.

data.name: VirologyData
data.comment: Genetic analysis of a virus and research into its composition, symptoms and transmission.

data.name: VisitorRegister
data.comment: A list of non-employee personnel logged at a settlement within a certain time period.

data.name: WeaponInventory
data.comment: A comprehensive record of all weaponry and ammunition stored at a facility.

data.name: PersonalDocuments
data.comment: An assortment of personal data.

data.name: TacticalPlans
data.comment: An outline for a military or security operation intended to achieve a stated objective.

data.name: ChemicalProcessSample
data.comment: A sample of an unidentified substance used in a settlement's chemical production line.

data.name: PyrolyticCatalyst
data.comment: A substance that greatly alters the chemical properties of material it interacts with.

data.name: WeaponSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the design and mechanism of a personal firearm.

data.name: Californium
data.comment: A highly radioactive chemical element.

data.name: SuitSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the design of a protective suit.

data.name: Spyware
data.comment: A program designed to infiltrate digital networks and collect data without detection.

data.name: EmploymentHistory
data.comment: A detailed list of an individual’s prior employment, roles and professional experience.

data.name: AgriculturalProcessSample
data.comment: A sample of an unidentified substance used in a settlement's agricultural production line.

data.name: SurveillanceEquipment
data.comment: An assortment of audio-visual and biometric monitoring devices.

data.name: ShipSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the internal and external design of a starship.

data.name: VehicleSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the internal and external design of a surface vehicle.

data.name: Virus
data.comment: A program designed to infect digital networks and cause targeted or systemic damage.

data.name: ChemicalSample
data.comment: An unidentified chemical compound.

data.name: IonisedGas
data.comment: A quantity of ionised gas.

data.name: Aerogel
data.comment: An extremely lightweight thermal insulator.

data.name: CarbonFibrePlating
data.comment: A flexible, lightweight material made of organic polymers.

data.name: MicroSuperCapacitor
data.comment: A device designed to store an electric charge.

data.name: TitaniumPlating
data.comment: A strong, low-density metal that is highly resistant to corrosion.
